abstract: Five-year-old thoroughbred Flat Out wins Jockey Club Gold Cup horse race at Belmont Park.
snippet: The 5-year-old Flat Out becomes a favorite at next month’s BC Classic, along with two of Saturday’s other winners Uncle Mo and the filly Havre de Grace.
lead_paragraph: The 5-year-old Flat Out becomes a favorite at next month’s BC Classic, along with two of Saturday’s other winners Uncle Mo and the filly Havre de Grace.

headline.main: Flat Out Wins Gold Cup; Stay Thirsty Takes Third
headline.print_headline: Flat Out Wins Gold Cup; Stay Thirsty Takes Third
headline.seo: Flat Out Wins Jockey Club Gold Cup; Favored Stay Thirsty Is Third
